title: WTB: T206 Lenox or Red Hindu backed HOFer
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Lenox or Red Hindu backed HOFer
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Frank B

 Looking for one example of each. 

 Any grade considered except Authentic.



 Also looking for a grade of PSA5/SGC60 or better HOFer

 with Carolina Brights, Brown Hindu and Polar Bear.



 Prefer Brown, Clarke, Crawford, Duffy, Jennings, Joss, Keeler, McGinnity, 

 Waddell and Wheat over all others with any of the five above backs.



 Baker, Chance, Marquard, Cobb, Johnson and Speaker are five players

 that I do not need. 



 Please e-mail if you have any for sale or trade. 



 Thanks - FrankB

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Lenox or Red Hindu backed HOFer
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ed Hans
Frank,
    I suspect you mean "Lenox". There is a player named "Lennox"in T206. The tobacco brand is "Lenox".
